description.english: Achieved a maximum score in all trials and assembled the Golden Friend Ship!
description.german: Maximale Punktzahl in allen Prüfungen erreicht und das Goldene Freundschaftsschiff gebaut!
description.french: Vous avez obtenu le score maximal dans Amitié en or !
description.italian: Hai totalizzato il punteggio massimo in tutte le prove e costruito la nave dell'amicizia dorata!
description.koreana: 모든 시련에서 최고 점수를 달성하고 황금 우정선을 건조했습니다!
description.spanish: ¡Conseguiste la puntuación máxima en todas las pruebas y armaste un barco de oro, como vuestra amistad!
description.schinese: 已在所有试炼中获得最高分，并组装了友情金船！
description.tchinese: 於所有測試達成滿分並拼湊出黃金友誼號！
description.russian: Достигнуто максимальное количество очков во всех испытаниях и собран «Золотой Корабль Дружбы»!
description.thai: ได้รับแต้มสูงสุดในด่านทดสอบทั้งหมดและรวมลูกทีมให้เรือเฟรนด์ชิปทองคำ!
description.japanese: すべての試練で最高スコアを達成し、黄金の友情を築け！
description.portuguese: Alcançaste a pontuação máxima em todas as provas e montaste o Navio da Amizade Dourado!
description.polish: Za zdobycie maksymalnej liczby punktów we wszystkich próbach i złożenie złotego statku!
description.danish: Opnåede den højeste score i alle prøver og samlede det gyldne Friend Ship!
description.dutch: Een maximale score behaald in alle proeven en de Gouden Vriendschap in elkaar gezet!
description.finnish: Sai maksimipisteet kaikissa koetuksissa ja rakensi Kultaisen Ystävyydenlaivan!
description.norwegian: Oppnådde maksimal poengsum i alle prøvelser og satte sammen Golden Friend Ship!
description.swedish: Fick maxpoäng i alla test och satte ihop gyllene Vänskapen!
description.czech: Dosáhli jste maximálního skóre ve všech zkouškách a sestavili jste zlatou loď přátelství!
description.turkish: Tüm testlerde maksimum puana ulaşın ve Altın Arkadaşlık Gemisi'ni inşa edin!
description.arabic: حققت أقصى النقاط في كل الاختبارات وجمّعت سفينة الصديق الذهبية!
description.brazilian: Atingiram pontuação máxima em todos os testes e montaram o FraterNau Dourado!

displayName.thai: เราทำได้ดีกว่านั้น!

description.thai: ฉีกตั๋ว 5 ใบ
description.japanese: チケットを5枚消費した

description.english: Completed the trials and launched a sea-worthy vessel!
description.german: Erprobung abgeschlossen und ein seetüchtiges Schiff zu Wasser gelassen!
description.french: Vous avez terminé les épreuves et avez lancé un navire digne de votre amitié !
description.italian: Hai completato le prove e varato un'imbarcazione a prova di qualsiasi navigazione!
description.koreana: 시련을 마치고 항해할 수 있는 선박을 진수했습니다!
description.spanish: ¡Completaste las pruebas y botaste un buen barco!
description.schinese: 已完成试炼，并使远洋船舶下海！
description.tchinese: 完成測試並使一艘適合航行的船隻下水！
description.russian: Испытания завершены и запущено мореходное судно!
description.thai: จบด่านทดสอบทั้งหมดและปล่อยเรือขั้นเทพ!
description.japanese: 試練をクリアし、海にふさわしい船を出した！
description.portuguese: Concluíste as provas e lançaste uma embarcação digna do mar!
description.polish: Za ukończenie prób i zwodowanie pływającego statku!
description.danish: Gennemførte prøverne og søsatte et sødygtigt fartøj!
description.dutch: De proeven doorlopen en een zeewaardig vaartuig te water gelaten!
description.finnish: Suoritti koetukset ja lähetti merenkulkuun sopivan laivan vesille!
description.norwegian: Fullførte forsøkene og sjøsatte et sjøverdig fartøy!
description.swedish: Slutförde testen och sjösatte ett sjövärdigt fartyg!
description.czech: Dokončili jste zkoušky a na vodu spustili koráb hodný moře!
description.turkish: Testleri tamamlayın ve denize uygun bir gemi indirin!
description.arabic: أتممت هذه الاختبارات وأطلقت سفينة تستحق الإبحار!
description.brazilian: Completaram os testes e lançaram um barco digno do mar!

displayName.thai: จัดตั้งทีม!

description.english: Invite a friend to play We Were Here: The Friendship!
description.german: Lade einen Freund ein, Wir waren hier: Die Freundschaft! zu spielen
description.french: Vous avez invité un(e) ami(e) à jouer à We Were Here : L'Amitié
description.italian: Hai invitato i tuoi amici a giocare a We Were Here: La Navicizia!
description.koreana: 친구를 초대하여 We Were Here: The Friendship을 플레이했습니다!
description.spanish: ¡Invitaste a un amigo a jugar a We Were Here: La nave Amistad!
description.schinese: 邀请好友体验《我们永远在这里：友谊号》！
description.tchinese: 邀請一位好友遊玩《We Were Here：The Friendship》！
description.russian: Пригласите друга в «We Were Here: The Friendship»!
description.thai: ชวนเพื่อนมาเล่น We Were Here: เรือเฟรนด์ชิป!
description.japanese: 『We Were Here:The Friendship』にフレンドを招待してプレイしよう！
description.portuguese: Convidaste um(a) amigo(a) para jogar We Were Here: The Friendship!
description.polish: Za zaproszenie znajomego do gry We Were Here: The Friendship!
description.danish: Inviter en ven til at spille We Were Here: The Friendship!
description.dutch: Nodig een vriend uit om We Were Here: The Friendship te spelen!
description.finnish: Kutsu kaveri pelaamaan We Were Here: Ystävyydenlaiva!
description.norwegian: Inviter en venn til å spille We Were Here: The Friendship!
description.swedish: Bjud in en vän att spela We Were Here: Vänskapen!
description.czech: Pozvěte kamaráda, aby si s vám zahrál We Were Here: The Friendship!
description.turkish: Bir arkadaşınızı We Were Here oynamaya davet edin: Arkadaşlık!
description.arabic: ادعُ أحد الأصدقاء للعب We Were Here: الصداقة!
description.brazilian: Convidar um amigo para jogar We Were Here: o FraterNau!
